resources.string:
Frank: yo, wuddup bro?!

 Chris: BROOOOOOOOOOO, where them bitches at?!

 Frank: I don't know, bro. You're the one with the hooks, lines, and sinkers!

 Chris: Man, you gotta catch the fuck up.

 Frank: Those are fighting words, bro! I'm gonna have to beat you up for that one!

 Chris: BRING! IT! OOOOOOOON, BRO!

 Frank: Oh, it's coming. And when it does, you won't even know what hit you, bro!

 Chris: You have no idea what kind of training I've been through since we've last been together, bro! You seriously do not want to start a fight with me!

 Frank: I could say the same thing to you, my friend! I'll see you in the parking lot at 5 hundred hours! You better be there on time!

 Chris: Prepare to get your ass handed to you, bro!

The Mother: When are you done work tonight?

 Me: Beats me, lawl.

 The Mother: Look, buddy boy! I'm not going to just drop everhthing I'm doing at the drop of a hat if you tell me you're clocking out in the moment! Don't expect a speedy pick up if you can't tell me when you're clocking out ahead of time.

 Me: Never said I would.

 The Mother: Don't you use that tone of voice with me, young man! I have half a mind to ground your insolence!

 Me: You only have half a brain? The Mother: That's IT! You're grounded as soon as you get home!

 Me: OPE! Looks like I won't be making it home tonight. I've got a company retreat I'm required to attend.

 The Mother: COMPANY RETREAT ME ASS! You better get your ass home after work or so help me\.\.\.!

 Me: No can do, madre. The bus it already here. The Mother: YOU STAY PUT! I'm coming over there right now! Me: Wait, does that mean I can get off work early? The Mother: \.\.\.
